name: The Sun Goes Out
description:
Story

"The Sun Goes Out" is a very short story about survival and about what people need to survive - and thrive - most of all.

A microgame?

"The Sun Goes Out" is a micro visual novel made for O2A2 2022 Jam. Limited to 1,000 words or less, 1 background, 1 sprite, etc...

Art, story, and music by S. A. Welland.
